verses.text: So all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were reckoned by \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w*; and, behold, they \add were\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add who\add* were carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* for their \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w*.

¶ Now the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* that \add dwelt\add* in their \w possessions|strong="H0272"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add*, the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*.

And in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*;

\w Uthai|strong="H5793"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imri|strong="H0566"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
And of the \w Shilonites|strong="H7888"\w*; \w Asaiah|strong="H6222"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*; \w Jeuel|strong="H3262"\w*, and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w*.

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*; \w Sallu|strong="H5543"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hodaviah|strong="H1938"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hasenuah|strong="H5574"\w*,

And \w Ibneiah|strong="H2997"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, and \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michri|strong="H4381"\w*, and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shephathiah|strong="H8203"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ibnijah|strong="H2998"\w*;

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, according to their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w*. All these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were\add* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.
¶ And of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*; \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, and \w Jehoiarib|strong="H3080"\w*, and \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*,

And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meraioth|strong="H4812"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;\f + \fr 9.11 \ft Azariah: also called, Seraiah\f*

And \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Maasiai|strong="H4640"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adiel|strong="H5717"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jahzerah|strong="H3170"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshillemith|strong="H4921"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w*;

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w*; very \w able|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* for the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft very…: Heb. mighty men of valour\f*

And of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*; \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hasshub|strong="H2815"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*;

And \w Bakbakkar|strong="H1230"\w*, \w Heresh|strong="H2792"\w*, and \w Galal|strong="H1559"\w*, and \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4316"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*;

And \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Galal|strong="H1559"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, and \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w Netophathites|strong="H5200"\w*.

And the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* \add were\add*, \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*, and \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, and \w Talmon|strong="H2929"\w*, and \w Ahiman|strong="H0289"\w*, and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \add was\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*;

Who hitherto \add waited\add* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*: they \add were\add* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* in the \w companies|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

And \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kore|strong="H6981"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ebiasaph|strong="H0043"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w Korahites|strong="H7145"\w*, \add were\add* over the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H5592"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*: and their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add being\add* over the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add were\add* \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w entry|strong="H3996"\w*.\f + \fr 9.19 \ft gates: Heb. thresholds\f*

And \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* was the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over them in time \w past|strong="H6440"\w*, \add and\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* with him.

\add And\add* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshelemiah|strong="H4920"\w* \add was\add* \w porter|strong="H7778"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

All these \add which were\add* \w chosen|strong="H1305"\w* to be \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H5592"\w* \add were\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*. These were reckoned by their \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* in their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w* did \w ordain|strong="H3245"\w* in their set \w office|strong="H0530"\w*.\f + \fr 9.22 \ft did…: Heb. founded\f*\f + \fr 9.22 \ft set…: or, trust\f*

So they and their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add had\add* the oversight of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add namely\add*, the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, by \w wards|strong="H4931"\w*.

In \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w quarters|strong="H7307"\w* were the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add which were\add* in their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, \add were\add* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* after \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* from \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w time|strong="H6256"\w* with them.

For these \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w chief|strong="H1368"\w* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, were in \add their\add* set \w office|strong="H0530"\w*, and were over the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* and \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft set…: or, trust\f*\f + \fr 9.26 \ft chambers: or, storehouses\f*

¶ And they \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, because the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \add was\add* upon them, and the \w opening|strong="H4668"\w* thereof every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \add pertained\add* to them.

And \add certain\add* of them had the charge \w of|strong="H5921"\w* the \w ministering|strong="H5656"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, that they should bring them \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by \w tale|strong="H4557"\w*.\f + \fr 9.28 \ft bring…: Heb. bring them in by tale, and carry them out by tale\f*

\add Some\add* of them also \add were\add* \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* to oversee the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and the fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, and the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, and the \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*.\f + \fr 9.29 \ft instruments: or, vessels\f*
And \add some\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w made|strong="H7543"\w* the \w ointment|strong="H4842"\w* of the \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*.

And \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, \add one\add* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, who \add was\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w Korahite|strong="H7145"\w*, had the set \w office|strong="H0530"\w* over the things that were \w made|strong="H4639"\w* in the \w pans|strong="H2281"\w*.\f + \fr 9.31 \ft set…: or, trust\f*\f + \fr 9.31 \ft in…: or, on flat plates, or, slices\f*

And \add other\add* of their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*, \add were\add* over the \w shewbread|strong="H3899"\w*, to \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \add it\add* every \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*.\f + \fr 9.32 \ft shewbread: Heb. bread of ordering\f*

And these \add are\add* the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add who remaining\add* in the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add were\add* \w free|strong="H6362"\w*: for they were employed in \add that\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.\f + \fr 9.33 \ft they…: Heb. upon them\f*

These \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add were\add* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*; these \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And in \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Jehiel|strong="H3273"\w*, whose \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*:

And his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w*, then \w Zur|strong="H6698"\w*, and \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*, and \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, and \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*,
And \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*, and \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Mikloth|strong="H4732"\w*.

And \w Mikloth|strong="H4732"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shimeam|strong="H8043"\w*. And they also \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, over against their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

And \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*; and \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, and \w Malchi-shua|strong="H4444"\w*, and \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and \w Esh-baal|strong="H0792"\w*.

And the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \add was\add* \w Merib-baal|strong="H4807"\w*: and \w Merib-baal|strong="H4810"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \add were\add*, \w Pithon|strong="H6377"\w*, and \w Melech|strong="H4429"\w*, and \w Tahrea|strong="H8475"\w*, \add and Ahaz\add*.

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jarah|strong="H3294"\w*; and \w Jarah|strong="H3294"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Alemeth|strong="H5964"\w*, and \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*, and \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*; and \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Moza|strong="H4162"\w*;

And \w Moza|strong="H4162"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Binea|strong="H1150"\w*; and \w Rephaiah|strong="H7509"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Eleasah|strong="H0501"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w* had \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \add are\add* these, \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w*, \w Bocheru|strong="H1074"\w*, and \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, and \w Sheariah|strong="H8187"\w*, and \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, and \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*: these \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w*.
